data.text: @ArnabGofficial7 तुम bjp का प्रवक्ता बन के दलाली करो।

@ArnabGofficial7 India saw dead bodies in ganga, millions of workers walking on streets to way home, millions of jobs lost, people died on roads for the lack of beds and oxigen, hospitals denied to give admission to critical patients. 

You must thank that u survived.
@ArnabGofficial7 sirf yeh dalal apne khud ke show par ANTI NATIONAL / DESH DROHI / BAZAARU  sabit kar diya gaye....abhibhi time hai. Isko school bhejo pehle

@ArnabGofficial7 It,s absolutely right . Demand and supply both sides are seeing  rapidly growth. It,s proved Indian economic recovery on solid way due to reformed of Modi Government.Jai hind . Vande Matram.
@ArnabGofficial7 So, the Indians can expect a reasonable reduction in fuel prices now?
